cab.content: 13th May,1918Aith reference to your note attached to theDraft Hinutes of War Cabinet 408A, "A" Minutes are circulated only to those present at the Meeting andthese Minutes are never printed or oven cyclostyled, butare typed by a confidential typist.There is no danger from their circulation, as there who receive copies are asked to return them,whenthe copies are locked away for record purposes.
